attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After so many years of excusing the selfish, bullying, boorish and aggresive behaviour of those in our society who put themselves beyond the law, it is now time that all governemt agencies stood up for the hard-working, law abiding silent majority and actively removed those who make others lives a misery through their feral, unchecked behaviour, and punish not just the offspring but also the parents of these animals, so they finally realise their type is not wanted and their benefits lifestyle will not be supported if they chose to exist outside the law.
